mapper.insert: insert into conversation (goods_id, buyer_id, seller_id, last_message, last_message_at, unread_for_buyer, unread_for_seller, created_at) values (#{goodsId}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{lastMessage}, #{lastMessageAt}, #{unreadForBuyer}, #{unreadForSeller}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select id, goods_id, buyer_id, seller_id, last_message, last_message_at, unread_for_buyer, unread_for_seller, created_at from conversation where buyer_id = #{userId} or seller_id = #{userId} order by last_message_at desc
